Purpose: To accurately and reliably measure Lisdexamfetamine and its metabolites in urine samples for clinical assessment, following laboratory standards.
Container: BD Vacutainer Urinalysis Preservative Tube (7–9 mL preferred)
Equipment: Gas Chromatography–Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) or Liquid Chromatography–Tandem Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS), calibrated centrifuge, vortex mixer
